long_description: Make camp feel more like home with this regular-size Therm-a-Rest Fitted Sheet. It fits snugly over your Therm-a-Rest mattress to give you a more luxurious and restful experience. Elastic hem and bottom fit a wide array of mattresses; matches up with the Therm-a-Rest Tech Blanket (not included). Brushed fabric is soft against the skin for bedlike comfort on the go. Offers an added layer of protection for your mattress. Measures 72 x 20 in. Polyester Therm-a-Rest Fitted Sheet is machine washable for easy care. Closeout.
short_description: Make camp feel more like home with this regular-size Therm-a-Rest Fitted Sheet. It fits snugly over your Therm-a-Rest mattress to give you a more luxurious and restful experience.
